short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens Videos from OE24.tv in a new tab, or remove Ads in-place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helps to get a better user experience when watching videos on OE24.tv. 
The extension will insert a button to open the video in a new tab, or replace the video by a pure HTML video tag playing the source mp4.
